item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: February 23, 2025 Today's Verse Psalm 50:14–15 [14] Offer to God a sacrifice of thanksgiving, and perform your vows to the Most High, [15] and call upon me in the day of trouble; I will deliver you, and you shall glorify me.” Today's Memory Verse 2 Corinthians 5:17 - Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
